snippet: Two former employees at Freedom Industries pleaded guilty to a pollution charge Wednesday in a chemical spill that fouled a tap water supply last year.
abstract: Former Freedom Industries employees Michael Burdette and Robert Reynolds plead guilty to a pollution charge in chemical spill that fouled West Virginia tap water supply in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Two former employees at Freedom Industries pleaded guilty to a pollution charge Wednesday in a chemical spill that fouled a tap water supply last year.

headline.main: West Virginia: More Guilty Pleas for Polluting River
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: More Guilty Pleas for Polluting River
